channel.title: WiFi on madd0's tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in WiFi on madd0's tech blog

item.title: Crossing oceans… (part I)
item.description: Oops, I forgot to post this when arriving at Costa Rica. I’ll post now, and you can read everything about me leaving in the next entry ;) I am sitting on the floor in Barajas airport in Madrid right now. It’s 09:24 local time and the airport is as empty as they get. This entry will not be posted right away though. I have no intention (or the means) to pay 5€ for 30 minutes of wireless Internet access (I’ll talk about this again later.
